price: Na hakika sisi ndio wenye kusabihi kutakasa.
footnotes: Na hakika sisi bila ya shaka yoyote ndio wenye kumtakasa Mwenyezi Mungu na kila lisilo kuwa na maelekeo naye katika kila hali.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
